options.description: Specify paths to nuget packages. [Wildcards](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/wildcards.html?Wildcards) are supported.

Specify the NuGet feed URL. To use a [TeamCity NuGet feed](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/using-teamcity-as-nuget-feed.html?using-teamcity-as-nuget-feed), specify the URL from the NuGet feed project settings page. For feeds with authentication, configure the [NuGet Feed Credentials](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/nuget-feed-credentials.html?NuGet+Feed+Credentials) build feature

Specify the API key to access the NuGet packages feed. For the built-in [TeamCity NuGet feeds](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/using-teamcity-as-nuget-feed.html?Using+TeamCity+as+NuGet+Feed) use the %teamcity.nuget.feed.api.key%.
Enter [space-separated SDK](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/net.html?net#requiredNetSDK) or targeting pack versions to be required on build agents.
Enter additional command line parameters for [dotnet nuget push](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tools/dotnet-nuget-push).
